page.title: 09 CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Some of the old fashioned games are still played in Denton e.g. hopscotch and skipping.Some games have come from other parts of the country.Here is an example by an 8 year old.It is called "The Track Game". To find out who is counting first we tap and say fast,slow,fast,slow on a person's back with your hands.The person now tells the other person to stop.If the person stops on slow the other person counts slowly.To find out what to count up to,you twiddle your fingers then stop on one finger then the other person guesses which finger hit her. Each finger costs 10.So when the person guesses the finger she will be at a number e.g.60.The other person will count up to 60 slowly.My friend goes off and hides.When she is hiding she has to leave tracks pointing to which way she has gone.
